nodes.bodyText: Why do we remove this method? I did a code search and I guess it is not related to this patch but because it is not used anywhere, right?
This refactoring is irrelevant to this patch. To keep this PR self-contained, I will revert this change, and create a new refactoring PR for the meta-changes.

Why do we remove this method? I did a code search and I guess it is not related to this patch but because it is not used anywhere, right?
I noticed that writeTo method exists in Replica, Broker, Load, Rack, Disk and Host. Should we also keep it in ClusterModel?
